Name: Marsh-Crest
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Special Attack and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Mudkip, Marshtomp, and Swampert.  Swap a Marsh-Mud and a Marsh-Card for a Marsh-Crest at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
